thread.title: Pink Hits the Gym, Says She Has 30 Pounds to Lose Eight Weeks After Welcoming Son Jameson
thread.title_full: Pink Hits the Gym, Says She Has 30 Pounds to Lose Eight Weeks After Welcoming Son Jameson

author: Jennifer Drysdale
title: Pink Hits the Gym, Says She Has 30 Pounds to Lose Eight Weeks After Welcoming Son Jameson
text: Pink Hits the Gym, Says She Has 30 Pounds to Lose Eight Weeks After Welcoming Son Jameson by Jennifer Drysdale 6:18   Photo: Getty Images Pink is working on her fitness! The mother of two took to Instagram on Wednesday to share a cool gym selfie -- and reveal that after five post-baby pounds lost, she still has 30 more to go. A post shared by P!NK (@pink) on Feb 22, 2017 at 10:31am PST WATCH: Pink Adorably Throws Daughter Willow a 'Big Sister Party' to Celebrate Son's New Arrival The 37-year-old singer has been shedding the pounds with the help of celebrity trainer Jeanette Jenkins after welcoming son Jameson Moon in December, though she wants other moms to know that it's okay if their bodies don't bounce back immediately. "Day 1 Lets do this @msjeanettejenkins (week 6 post baby and I haven't lost ANY WEIGHT YET!!!!) yaye me I'm normal! ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚," she captioned a snap with Jenkins earlier this month. A post shared by P!NK (@pink) on Feb 6, 2017 at 11:03am PST As for who else Pink has in her corner, that would be her husband, Carey Hart, who has taken over babysitting duties by taking little Jameson to work. See more in the video below. RELATED SLIDESHOW
